item.title: 欧洲的目标是太空发射协议中的竞争性重组
item.description:
(This Nov. 6 story has been corrected to move the expert's quote from paragraph 7 to paragraph 15 to show that he was referring to the exploration project)翻译:（这篇 11 月 6 日的报道已被更正，将专家的引述从第 7 段移至第 15 段，以表明他指的是勘探项目）

Europe on Monday challenged the private sector to develop services for small rockets that could guide future space reform, while stabilising finances for troubled medium and heavyweight launchers for the coming decade.翻译:欧洲周一要求私营部门开发小型火箭服务，以指导未来的太空改革，同时稳定未来十年陷入困境的中型和重型运载火箭的财务状况。

The head of the European Space Agency (ESA) said the decision to foster competition had long-term implications for the industry, which is wrestling with a short-term gap in space access due to delays and technical setbacks with Ariane 6 and Vega-C rockets.翻译:欧洲航天局 (ESA) 负责人表示，促进竞争的决定对该行业产生了长期影响，由于阿丽亚娜 6 号和织女星 C 的延误和技术挫折，该行业正在努力解决太空准入方面的短期差距。火箭。

"We are in the midst of a paradigm shift for space transportation," Director General Josef Aschbacher said halfway through two days of space talks in Seville, Spain.翻译:“我们正处于太空运输范式转变之中，”总干事约瑟夫·阿施巴赫在西班牙塞维利亚举行的为期两天的太空会谈中途说道。

The announcement marks a new departure for the 22-nation agency which has previously designed and procured launchers and wants to move towards a leaner system of buying services to help Europe mimic the runaway growth of rivals like Elon Musk's SpaceX.翻译:这一公告标志着这家由 22 个国家组成的机构的新起点，该机构此前曾设计和采购发射器，并希望转向更精简的购买服务系统，以帮助欧洲模仿埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX等竞争对手的快速增长。

"The launcher challenge...will lower the cost of public funding and stimulate a new market for European space entrepreneurs," Aschbacher told ministers.翻译:“发射器挑战……将降低公共资金成本，并为欧洲航天企业家刺激新市场，”阿施巴赫告诉部长们。

Such projects would start with a new generation of mini-launchers but could set the tone for longer-term replacements for Europe's heavier Ariane 6 and Vega-C, which remain Europe's only independent options for major payloads in coming years.翻译:此类项目将从新一代迷你发射器开始，但可能为欧洲较重的阿丽亚娜 6 和织女星 C 的长期替代奠定了基调，这仍然是欧洲未来几年主要有效载荷的唯一独立选择。

The move is part of a broader deal easing months of tensions after France lobbied for more support for Ariane 6, Germany pressed for competition in the France-led launch sector and Italy demanded a bigger say on its domestically produced Vega-C.

LAUNCHER DEAL

In a side declaration, France, Germany and Italy took credit for breaking deadlock and forging an agreement backed by other ESA nations, though delegates said all 22 nations had a role.翻译:在一份侧面声明中，法国、德国和意大利因打破僵局并达成了其他欧空局国家支持的协议而受到赞誉，不过代表们表示，所有 22 个国家都发挥了作用。

"We have a stable future for heavy and medium-sized launchers. This is a big relief because a few days ago we did not have this situation yet," Aschbacher told reporters.翻译:“我们对于重型和中型发射器有一个稳定的未来。这让人松了一口气，因为几天前我们还没有出现这种情况，”阿施巴赫告诉记者。

The deal means countries involved in existing launchers will provide up to 340 million euros ($364.48 million) of annual support for Ariane 6 and 21 million euros for Vega-C from 2026, to help close a gap between rising costs and market prices.翻译:该协议意味着，从 2026 年起，参与现有发射器的国家将为阿丽亚娜 6 提供高达 3.4 亿欧元（3.6448 亿美元）的年度支持，为 Vega-C 提供高达 2100 万欧元的支持，以帮助缩小不断上升的成本与市场价格之间的差距。

They also guaranteed four institutional launches a year for Ariane 6 and three for Vega-C.翻译:他们还保证每年四次机构发射 Ariane 6 和 3 次 Vega-C。

The agreement secures a second batch of Ariane 6 launches from flights 16 to 42 after previous commitments covered an inaugural test flight and 14 commercial launches. That will give Airbus and other contractors more confidence to order parts.翻译:继之前的承诺包括首次试飞和 14 次商业发射后，该协议确保从第 16 至 42 次航班进行第二批阿丽亚娜 6 号发射。这将使空客和其他承包商更有信心订购零件。

In return, the industry will have to cut costs by 11%, French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire told reporters. Ariane 6 is built by Airbus-Safran (AIR.PA), (SAF.PA) venture ArianeGroup.翻译:法国财政部长布鲁诺·勒梅尔 (Bruno Le Maire) 告诉记者，作为回报，该行业必须削减 11% 的成本。阿丽亚娜 6 由空中客车赛峰集团(AIR.PA) (SAF.PA)合资企业阿丽亚娜集团 (ArianeGroup) 建造。

Italy said earlier the deal could also lead to Vega-C being operated by Italian manufacturer Avio (AVI.MI) in addition to Arianespace, which is currently the sole European operator.翻译:意大利早些时候表示，除了目前唯一的欧洲运营商 Arianespace 之外，该交易还可能导致 Vega-C 由意大利制造商 Avio (AVI.MI)运营。

Ministers also agreed to breathe new life into exploration by inviting private funding for a potential space plane to ferry cargo to and from the International Space Station.翻译:部长们还同意邀请私人资金建造一架潜在的太空飞机，以在国际空间站之间运送货物，从而为探索注入新的活力。

"It's a mini-revolution because what they want to do now is buy a service," said Antoine Meunier, author of a recent book on the "long road" to European crewed space flight.翻译:“这是一场小型革命，因为他们现在想做的是购买服务，”安托万·莫尼耶（Antoine Meunier）说，他最近出版了一本关于欧洲载人航天“漫长道路”的书。

However the new initiative, backed by 75 million euros of public seed funding, fell short of recent calls by experts including former NATO Secretary General Anders Fogh Rasmussen for a radical European plan to catch up with dominant space powers like the U.S., Russia, China and increasingly India.翻译:然而，这项由 7500 万欧元公共种子资金支持的新举措，未能满足包括前北约秘书长安德斯·福格·拉斯穆森在内的专家最近的呼吁，要求欧洲采取一项激进的计划，以赶上美国、俄罗斯、中国和日本等主导太空强国。越来越印度。

Aschbacher, who has warned Europe against falling behind on space as it did on IT, described the plane as a "first step" and said it could be eventually be adapted to include human flight.翻译:阿施巴赫警告欧洲不要像在信息技术领域那样在太空领域落后，他将这架飞机描述为“第一步”，并表示它最终可能会适应载人飞行。

Until now, Europe has carved out a leading role in climate and scientific observation but rarely targeted a prime role in human exploration - opting instead for a junior role in projects led by U.S. space agency NASA or until recently Russia.翻译:到目前为止，欧洲已经在气候和科学观测方面发挥了主导作用，但很少在人类探索中发挥主要作用，而是选择在美国航天局或直到最近的俄罗斯领导的项目中扮演次要角色。

The proposal echoes the Hermes space plane, which never got off the drawing board. Europe's answer to the U.S. Space Shuttle was designed to carry three astronauts but was scrapped in 1992.翻译:该提案与从未脱离设计阶段的赫尔墨斯太空飞机相呼应。欧洲仿效美国航天飞机的设计目的是搭载三名宇航员，但于 1992 年被废弃。

($1 = 0.9328 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9328 欧元）

Reporting by Tim Hepher, Giuseppe Fonte, Charlotte Van Campenhout; editing by Robert Birsel, Barbara Lewis, Josie Kao and Rod Nickel翻译:Tim Hepher、Giuseppe Fonte、Charlotte Van Campenhout 报道；编辑：Robert Birsel、Barbara Lewis、Josie Kao 和 Rod Nickel
item.author: Tim Hepher, Giuseppe Fonte

item.title: 由于中国数据抵消了供应削减，油价跌至2-1/2月低点
item.description:
Oil prices hit fresh 2-1/2-month lows on Tuesday as mixed economic data from China offset the impact of Saudi Arabia and Russia extending output cuts.翻译:由于中国好坏参半的经济数据抵消了沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯延长减产的影响，周二油价触及2-1/2个月新低。

Brent crude futures were down $1.45, or 1.7%, to $83.73 a barrel as of 1242 GMT while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was at $79.58 a barrel, down $1.24, or 1.53%. Both hit their lowest levels since late August.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 1242 年，布伦特原油期货下跌 1.45 美元，至每桶 83.73 美元，跌幅为 1.7%，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货价格为每桶 79.58 美元，跌幅为 1.24 美元，跌幅为 1.53%。两者均创八月下旬以来的最低水平。

The premium on front-month loading Brent contracts over ones loading in six months' time was also at a 2-1/2-month low, indicating market participants are less concerned with current supply deficits.翻译:近月装船的布伦特原油合约相对于六个月后装船的溢价也处于 2-1/2 个月的低点，表明市场参与者不太担心当前的供应短缺。

While China's crude oil imports in October showed robust growth both year on year and month on month, its total exports contracted at a quicker pace than expected.翻译:尽管10月份中国原油进口量同比、环比均强劲增长，但出口总量收缩速度快于预期。

Expectations of crude run reductions by China-based refiners between November and December could also limit oil demand and exacerbate price declines.翻译:对中国炼油厂在 11 月至 12 月间减少原油产量的预期也可能限制石油需求并加剧价格下跌。

World shares (.MIWD00000PUS), which often trade in tandem with oil, lost steam on Tuesday as investor enthusiasm about a peak in global interest rates faded. In addition, the U.S. dollar (.DXY) has ticked up from recent lows, making oil more expensive for holders of other currencies.翻译:由于投资者对全球利率见顶的热情消退，经常与石油同步交易的世界股市(.MIWD00000PUS)周二失去动力。此外，美元（.DXY）已从近期低点上涨，使得石油对其他货币持有者来说更加昂贵。

On the supply side, markets are waiting to see if Saudi Arabia and Russia are ready to rein in production voluntarily beyond the end of the year in addition to a broader deal among the OPEC+ producer group.翻译:在供应方面，除了欧佩克+生产国集团之间达成更广泛的协议外，市场还在观望沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯是否准备好在今年年底后自愿控制产量。

"Looking ahead to 2024, Saudi Arabia will probably find it difficult to withdraw its production cuts at the end of this year – after all, any expansion of Saudi Arabian oil production would risk generating an oversupply in the first half of next year," Commerzbank said in a note.翻译:德国商业银行表示：“展望2024年，沙特阿拉伯可能会发现很难在今年年底撤回减产措施，毕竟，沙特阿拉伯石油产量的任何扩张都将面临明年上半年供应过剩的风险。”在注释中说。

API industry data on U.S. crude stockpiles is expected after 2000 GMT on Tuesday.翻译:有关美国原油库存的 API 行业数据预计将于格林威治标准时间 2000 年之后公布。

Additional reporting by Trixie Yap in Singapore and Yuka Obayashi in Tokyo; editing by Jason Neely and Emelia Sithole-Matarise翻译:Trixie Yap 在新加坡和 Yuka Obayashi 在东京的补充报道； Jason Neely 和 Emelia Sithole-Matarise 编辑
item.author: Shadia Nasralla

item.title: 由于对利率乐观情绪的疑虑，股价失去动力
item.description:
Summary:
  • Euro STOXX 600 falls 0.4%
  • Dollar gains as appetite for riskier currencies diminishes
  • Aussie drops 1.2% on 'dovish hike' from RBA
  • Treasuries steady
翻译:概括：
  • 欧洲斯托克 600 指数下跌 0.4%
  • 随着对高风险货币的兴趣减弱，美元上涨
  • 澳洲联储“鸽派加息”导致澳元下跌 1.2%
  • 国债稳定

World shares lost steam on Tuesday as investor enthusiasm about a peak in global interest rates faded, while the dollar made gains as appetite for riskier currencies calmed.翻译:由于投资者对全球利率见顶的热情消退，世界股市周二失去动力，而美元则因对高风险货币的兴趣平息而上涨。

The MSCI world equity index (.MIWD00000PUS), which tracks shares in 47 countries, fell 0.4%. The broad Euro STOXX 600 (.STOXX) declined 0.4%, dragged down by energy stocks (.SXEP) which fell 1.5%, tracking a drop in crude oil prices.翻译:追踪 47 个国家股票的 MSCI 世界股票指数(.MIWD00000PUS)下跌 0.4%。受原油价格下跌影响，能源股(.SXEP)下跌 1.5%，欧元 STOXX 600 (.STOXX)整体下跌 0.4%。

U.S. Treasuries were broadly steady, having unwound some of the rally that followed the Federal Reserve's decision to leave interest rates on hold last week.翻译:美国国债总体稳定，上周美联储决定维持利率不变后的部分涨势有所回落。

Ten-year yields hovered at 4.641% - about 10 basis points (bps) above where they closed on Friday, after their biggest weekly drop since March, but well below the 5% mark touched in late October.翻译:十年期国债收益率徘徊在 4.641%，较上周五收盘价高出约 10 个基点 (bps)，创 3 月份以来最大单周跌幅，但远低于 10 月底触及的 5% 大关。

Wall Street was set for losses, too, with S&P 500 futures falling 0.3%.翻译:华尔街也将遭受损失，标准普尔 500 指数期货下跌 0.3%。

The Nasdaq (.IXIC) logged a seventh straight session of gains on Monday, capping its longest streak since January, though its gain was a slender 0.3% as the rally loses momentum.翻译:纳斯达克指数(.IXIC)周一连续第七个交易日上涨，结束了自 1 月份以来最长的连续上涨势头，但由于涨势失去动力，其涨幅仅为 0.3%。

"There was quite a bit of euphoria at the end of last week on the belief that the Fed is done, the jobs market is slowing, that the U.S. economy is going to experience a soft landing," said Michael Hewson, chief market analyst at CMC Markets UK.翻译:首席市场分析师迈克尔·休森(Michael Hewson)表示：“上周末，人们普遍相信美联储已经结束了，就业市场正在放缓，美国经济将经历软着陆。”英国 CMC 市场。

"People have started to become a bit more clear eyed. There is the risk that the Fed could rise again."翻译:“人们的眼光开始变得更加清醒。美联储有可能再次加息的风险。”

A trio of Fed officials are due to speak later in the day, with investors watching for clues on the central bank's next moves.翻译:美联储三名官员将于当天晚些时候发表讲话，投资者正在关注美联储下一步行动的线索。

Fed funds futures imply only a slim chance of another hike, but bets on rate cuts next year were trimmed.翻译:联邦基金期货暗示再次加息的可能性很小，但明年降息的押注有所减少。

"It continues to be a tug-of-war between markets and the Fed, as the latter has suggested that higher long-end yields would ... do the job of policy tightening for them," said Nicholas Chia, macro strategist at Standard Chartered.翻译:标准银行宏观策略师尼古拉斯·谢(Nicholas Chia)表示，“市场和美联储之间仍然是一场拉锯战，因为后者表示，长期收益率上升将......为他们起到收紧政策的作用。”特许。

"Markets probably fret that lower yields would force the Fed to re-think about an extended pause."翻译:“市场可能担心收益率下降将迫使美联储重新考虑延长暂停利率的决定。”

Earlier, MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) slipped 1.2%, snapping three straight days of gains.翻译:早些时候，摩根士丹利资本国际 (MSCI) 日本以外亚太地区最广泛股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌 1.2%，结束了连续三天的涨幅。

In China, data showed imports unexpectedly grew in October, while exports contracted faster than expected, in a mixed set of indicators that showed the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven.翻译:在中国，数据显示10月份进口意外增长，而出口收缩速度快于预期，一系列混合指标表明世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然不平衡。

Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) fell 1.7%, while mainland China blue chips (.CSI300) fell 0.4%.

DOLLAR UP

Against a basket of currencies, the dollar index rose 0.4% to 105.68, adding to gains of 0.2% on Monday and moving away from its near two-month low of 104.84 touched on Monday.翻译:美元兑一篮子货币上涨0.4%，至105.68，周一上涨0.2%，远离周一触及的近两个月低点104.84。

The index fell 1.3% last week, its steepest decline since mid-July, part of the wider risk-on mood in markets.翻译:该指数上周下跌 1.3%，为 7 月中旬以来的最大跌幅，是市场普遍风险偏好情绪的一部分。

Currency traders were also focused on the Australian dollar, which fell about 1.2% to $0.641 after the Reserve Bank of Australia announced a 25 basis point hike, as expected, taking the cash rate to a 12-year high of 4.35%.翻译:货币交易员也关注澳元，在澳大利亚储备银行如预期宣布加息25个基点，将现金利率推至12年高点4.35%后，澳元下跌约1.2%至0.641美元。

But the central bank softened its language on the necessity of any further action.翻译:但央行对于采取进一步行动的必要性软化了措辞。

The stronger dollar has pushed the Japanese yen back to the weak side of 150 to the dollar, and it hovered at 150.5 at the start of the European session.翻译:美元走强使得日元重回150兑美元的弱势区间，并在欧洲时段开盘时徘徊在150.5。

The euro slipped 0.4% to $1.067, down from an eight-week peak of $1.0756 hit on Monday.翻译:欧元兑美元汇率下跌0.4%至1.067美元，低于周一触及的八周高点1.0756美元。

In commodity markets, oil slipped 1.4% with Brent crude futures at $84.02 a barrel, erasing most of Monday's gains as the mixed data from China and winter demand worries offset the impact of Saudi Arabia and Russia extending output cuts.翻译:大宗商品市场方面，油价下跌 1.4%，布伦特原油期货报每桶 84.02 美元，抹去了周一的大部分涨幅，因中国好坏参半的数据和冬季需求担忧抵消了沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯延长减产的影响。

Reporting by Tom Wilson in London and Tom Westbrook in Singapore; Additional reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Kim Coghill and Christina Fincher翻译:汤姆·威尔逊 (Tom Wilson) 在伦敦和汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 在新加坡的报道； Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡的补充报道；编辑：Lincoln Feast、Kim Coghill 和 Christina Fincher
item.author: Tom Wilson

item.title: 美元延续涨势，欧元受德国数据打击
item.description:
The dollar advanced on Tuesday as last week's rally in riskier currencies took a breather, gaining on the euro after weak German data and on the Australian dollar after its central bank raised interest rates but hinted the hike was the cycle's last.翻译:美元周二走高，因上周高风险货币的涨势稍有喘息，德国数据疲弱后，欧元走强；澳大利亚央行加息，但暗示这是本周期的最后一次加息，澳元走强。

The dollar index which tracks the U.S. unit against six main peers was up 0.35% at 105.65, driven by a 0.37% fall in the euro to $1.0677 and a 0.4% drop in the pound to $1.2288.翻译:追踪美元兑六种主要货币的美元指数上涨 0.35%，至 105.65，欧元下跌 0.37%，至 1.0677 美元，英镑下跌 0.4%，至 1.2288 美元。

Tuesday data showing a larger-than-expected fall in German industrial production in September contributed to the euro's weakness, said Fiona Cincotta, senior financial market analyst at City Index.翻译:City Index高级金融市场分析师Fiona Cincotta表示，周二的数据显示德国9月份工业生产降幅超出预期，导致欧元走软。

"The data comes after the German manufacturing PMI showed a deep contraction in October and suggests that the sector remains under pressure, acting as a drag on the German economy," she said.翻译:她表示：“该数据是在德国制造业PMI显示10月份大幅收缩之后发布的，表明该行业仍然面临压力，拖累了德国经济。”

The euro, like most other currencies, gained sharply on the dollar last week as a series of data points - most notably U.S. data from Friday showing job growth slowed in October - sent the U.S. unit lower.翻译:与大多数其他货币一样，欧元上周兑美元汇率大幅上涨，原因是一系列数据点——尤其是周五的美国数据显示十月份就业增长放缓——导致欧元走低。

That led markets to price in Federal Reserve rate cuts by the middle of next year, contributing to a move lower in U.S. Treasury yields, and lifting risk appetite.翻译:这导致市场预计美联储将在明年年中降息，导致美国国债收益率下降，并提振风险偏好。

The dollar fell 1.4% last week, its steepest decline since mid-July, a sharp reversal after a recent run higher.翻译:美元上周下跌1.4%，创7月中旬以来最大跌幅，在近期走高后出现急剧逆转。

"If you look at the percentage of currencies that have been down versus the dollar over the last 26 weeks, it was approaching 100%, and data also showed very long dollar positioning ... so we got a reversal of some of those positions triggered by the jobs report," said Chester Ntonifor, foreign exchange strategist at BCA Research.翻译:“如果你看一下过去 26 周内兑美元汇率下跌的货币百分比，你会发现它接近 100%，而且数据还显示美元头寸非常多......因此我们触发了其中一些头寸的逆转BCA Research 外汇策略师切斯特·恩托尼福 (Chester Ntonifor) 表示：

Where markets go from here "will have to depend on the incoming data".翻译:市场将走向何方“将取决于传入的数据”。

The rally in bonds and equities last week looks to be fading, with yields higher at the start of the week and the market focus switching to Fed officials' comments this week.翻译:上周债券和股票的涨势似乎正在消退，本周初收益率走高，市场焦点转向本周美联储官员的评论。

Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said on Monday the U.S. central bank likely has more work ahead to control inflation.翻译:明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔·卡什卡利周一表示，美联储可能还有更多工作来控制通胀。

Fed Chairman Jerome Powell is due to speak on Wednesday and Thursday, when the focal point will be whether he maintains the more dovish tone struck after the Fed's policy meeting last week.翻译:美联储主席鲍威尔将于周三和周四发表讲话，届时焦点将是他是否维持上周美联储政策会议后的温和基调。

The focus was on Australia earlier in the day, where the Reserve Bank raised interest rates by 25 basis points to combat stubborn inflation, as expected, but markets seized on a tweak to the language in the central bank's statement, and concluded further tightening was unlikely.翻译:当天早些时候，焦点集中在澳大利亚，澳大利亚储备银行如预期加息 25 个基点，以应对顽固的通胀，但市场抓住了央行声明中措辞的调整，并得出进一步收紧政策的可能性不大。

The Australian dollar sank 1.2%% to $0.641, on course for its biggest one-day percentage decline in a month.翻译:澳元兑美元下跌 1.2%，至 0.641 美元，有望创一个月来最大单日跌幅。

Commonwealth Bank of Australia's currency strategist Carol Kong said RBA's forward guidance was slightly watered down, which was perceived as dovish, resulting in the Aussie quickly giving back its gains after an initial knee-jerk rally.翻译:澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师Carol Kong表示，澳洲联储的前瞻性指引略有淡化，这被认为是鸽派的，导致澳元在最初的本能反弹后迅速回吐涨幅。

The Aussie had been among the beneficiaries of last week's weakening dollar and touched a three-month peak on Monday翻译:澳元是上周美元疲软的受益者之一，周一触及三个月高点

"With the RBA out of the way, the major determinants of AUD/USD will shift back to global. Expect focus to move back to Fed rhetoric and the resultant impacts on U.S. Treasuries," Kong said.翻译:“随着澳洲联储的退出，澳元/美元的主要决定因素将重新转向全球。预计焦点将重新回到美联储的言论及其对美国国债的影响上，”孔说。

The dollar gained 0.24% on the Japanese yen to 150.43 yen, back above the 150-level that has kept traders on edge in recent weeks as they look for signs of intervention from Tokyo.翻译:美元兑日元汇率上涨0.24%，至150.43日元，回到150水平上方，近几周交易员在寻找东京干预迹象时一直处于紧张状态。

The yen softened to 151.74 per dollar last week, edging closer to October 2022 lows that spurred several rounds of dollar-selling intervention.翻译:上周日元兑美元汇率软至 151.74，接近 2022 年 10 月低点，引发多轮美元抛售干预。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore and Alun John in London ; Editing by Sam Holmes, Miral Fahmy, Edmund Klamann, Kim Coghill and Emelia Sithole-Matarise翻译:Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡和 Alun John 在伦敦的报道；编辑：Sam Holmes、Miral Fahmy、Edmund Klamann、Kim Coghill 和 Emelia Sithole-Matarise
item.author: Ankur Banerjee, Alun John

item.title: 欧洲“光子”芯片公司呼吁欧盟资助 45 亿美元
item.description:
Executives from a group of Europe's largest "photonic" computer chip companies have called on the European Union to support the growing industry with 4.25 billion euros ($4.54 billion) in funding to help it compete with rivals in Asia and the United States.翻译:欧洲最大的“光子”计算机芯片公司集团的高管呼吁欧盟提供 42.5 亿欧元（45.4 亿美元）的资金支持不断发展的行业，帮助其与亚洲和美国的竞争对手竞争。

Photonic semiconductors use light, rather than electrons, to perform calculations, with advantages in speed and power consumption, making them increasingly useful for applications in data centres and cars, among others.翻译:光子半导体使用光而不是电子来执行计算，具有速度和功耗方面的优势，使其在数据中心和汽车等应用中越来越有用。

The group presented EU officials at a summit in Eindhoven with an eight-year plan to support and build European supply chains, as well as guaranteeing smaller companies access manufacturing sites to conduct test runs.翻译:该组织在埃因霍温举行的峰会上向欧盟官员提出了一项八年计​​划，以支持和建立欧洲供应链，并保证较小的公司进入生产基地进行试运行。

"Currently, the EU has a vibrant and growing integrated photonics industry, however, without volume manufacturing, testing and packaging capacity we are incredibly vulnerable to global events and the policies of competitor countries," Johan Veenstra, CEO of SMART Photonics, said at the summit.翻译:SMART Photonics 首席执行官 Johan Veenstra 在会上表示：“目前，欧盟拥有充满活力且不断发展的集成光子产业，但是，如果没有批量制造、测试和封装能力，我们非常容易受到全球事件和竞争对手国家政策的影响。”首脑。

The European Union has previously designated photonics as a strategic technology, and named it as an area for potential funding under the 43 billion euro Chips Act passed in April, but it is not clear what resources are actually being devoted to photonics.翻译:欧盟此前已将光子学指定为战略技术，并根据 4 月份通过的 430 亿欧元《芯片法案》将其列为潜在资助领域，但目前尚不清楚实际上有哪些资源专门用于光子学。

SMART, which is a contract manufacturer of photonic chips, raised $110 million in July in a mix of Dutch government funding and debt funding from chipmaker NXP (NXPI.O), and equipment makers ASML (ASML.AS) and VDL Groep, to expand.翻译:SMART 是一家光子芯片合同制造商， 7 月筹集了 1.1 亿美元资金，资金包括荷兰政府融资以及芯片制造商恩智浦(NXP.O) 、设备制造商 ASML (ASML.AS)和 VDL Groep 的债务融资，以扩大业务规模。

Currently most photonics chips, like most chips, are made in Asia, with important intellectual property in the U.S.翻译:目前，大多数光子芯片与大多数芯片一样都是在亚洲制造的，重要的知识产权在美国

The statement said low levels of European manufacturing and over-reliance on Asia in manufacturing and packaging, "threatens the EU's economic security and resilience".翻译:声明称，欧洲制造业水平低下以及在制造和包装方面过度依赖亚洲，“威胁到欧盟的经济安全和弹性”。

The statement was signed by Germany's XFAB and Aixtron, the Netherlands' SMART Photonics and Phix Photonics Assembly, VLC Photonics of Spain, France's Almae, and Switzerland's Ligentec, as well as PhotonDelta, a public-private partnership in the Netherlands devoted to funding photonics.翻译:该声明由德国 XFAB 和 Aixtron、荷兰 SMART Photonics 和 Phix Photonics Assembly、西班牙 VLC Photonics、法国 Almae 和瑞士 Ligentec，以及荷兰致力于资助光子学的公私合作伙伴 PhotonDelta 签署。

($1 = 0.9360 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9360 欧元）

Reporting by Toby Sterling, editing by David Evans翻译:托比·斯特林报道，大卫·埃文斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着贸易恢复，中国和澳大利亚将重启年会
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese met Chinese Premier Li Qiang in Beijing on Tuesday, restarting an annual leaders' dialogue that Albanese said will continue as relations between the trading partners stabilised.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞周二在北京会见了中国总理李强，重启了年度领导人对话，阿尔巴内塞表示，随着贸易伙伴之间关系的稳定，对话将继续下去。

Albanese is in China on the first visit by an Australian leader in seven years, after a diplomatic dispute had put a halt to once-annual meetings of leaders.翻译:阿尔巴内塞此次访问中国是澳大利亚领导人七年来的首次访问，此前一场外交争端导致一年一次的领导人会晤暂停。

President Xi Jinping said on Monday stable ties between China and Australia served each other's interests and both should expand cooperation, sending a clear signal that China was ready to move on from recent tensions.翻译:习近平主席周一表示，中澳之间稳定的关系符合彼此利益，双方应扩大合作，发出明确信号，表明中国已准备好摆脱近期的紧张局势。

"The fact that these meetings are now going to continue is very important for our relations," Albanese told Li at the Great Hall of the People.翻译:“事实上，这些会议现在将继续进行，这对我们的关系非常重要，”阿尔巴内塞在人民大会堂对李克强说。

China is willing to work with Australia to further strengthen dialogue, deepen mutual trust, properly handle differences and make cooperation the main feature of bilateral ties, Li told Albanese.翻译:中方愿同澳方进一步加强对话，深化互信，妥善处理分歧，使合作成为两国关系的主要特色。

"The potential for cooperation between China and Australia is enormous," Li said.翻译:李说：“中澳合作潜力巨大。”

China has lifted trade blocks on most Australian exports imposed in 2020 in the wake of Australia's call for an international investigation into the origins of the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:在澳大利亚呼吁对 COVID-19 大流行的起源进行国际调查后，中国取消了 2020 年对澳大利亚大部分出口产品实施的贸易封锁。

China's October imports from Australia grew 12% from a year earlier to $11.96 billion, Chinese customs data showed on Tuesday, accelerating from the 4.9% increase in September.翻译:中国海关周二公布的数据显示，中国10月份从澳大利亚的进口同比增长12%，达到119.6亿美元，较9月份的4.9%增速有所加快。

From January to October, Chinese imports rose 8.4% to $128.76 billion. Last year, imports from Australia dived 12.7% to $142.1 billion.

'BLOC POLITICS'

Albanese said he had used the four-day visit to advocate for Australia's interests in trade, human rights, regional and global issues.翻译:阿尔巴内塞表示，他利用为期四天的访问来倡导澳大利亚在贸易、人权、地区和全球问题上的利益。

"While there are differences between us, both Australia and China benefit from cooperation and dialogue," Albanese said.翻译:阿尔巴尼斯说：“虽然我们之间存在分歧，但澳大利亚和中国都从合作与对话中受益。”

Among differences between the two countries is Beijing's growing security ties with Pacific island nations, while Australia's QUAD partnership with the U.S., India and Japan in the Indo-Pacific has stoked China's worries about containment.翻译:两国之间的分歧之一是北京与太平洋岛国日益加强的安全关系，而澳大利亚与美国、印度和日本在印太地区的四方伙伴关系引发了中国对遏制的担忧。

On Monday, Xi had warned in his meeting with Albanese against "bloc politics".翻译:周一，习近平在与阿尔巴内塞会面时警告反对“集团政治”。

China was "ready to carry out more trilateral and multilateral cooperation with Australia to support South Pacific countries in enhancing development resilience, addressing climate change and other challenges", Xi said.翻译:习近平表示，中方愿同澳大利亚开展更多三边、多边合作，支持南太国家增强发展韧性、应对气候变化等挑战。

Albanese travels from China to the Cooks Islands on Tuesday to attend the Pacific Islands Forum, an annual meeting of leaders of a region where the United States and its allies have stepped up competition with China for influence. Security ties should be kept within the region, he told reporters.翻译:阿尔巴内斯周二从中国前往库克群岛参加太平洋岛屿论坛，该论坛是该地区领导人的年度会议，美国及其盟国在该地区加强了与中国争夺影响力的竞争。他告诉记者，该地区应保持安全联系。

Albanese, in his remarks to Li, stressed the importance of managing rivalries.翻译:阿尔巴尼斯在对李克强的讲话中强调了管理竞争的重要性。

"Where there is geostrategic competition, we must all manage it carefully, through dialogue and through understanding," he said.翻译:他说：“在存在地缘战略竞争的地方，我们都必须通过对话和理解谨慎管理。”

In a statement after the meeting, Albanese did not mention key points of difference with China - including tensions in the South China Sea, and the AUKUS defence technology partnership with the United States and Britain to sell nuclear-powered submarines to Australia.翻译:在会后的一份声明中，阿尔巴尼斯没有提及与中国的关键分歧点，包括南海的紧张局势，以及AUKUS与美国和英国的国防技术合作伙伴关系，以向澳大利亚出售核动力潜艇。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham in Sydney and Ryan Woo in Beijing; Additional reporting by Ellen Zhang in Beijing; editing by Robert Birsel and David Evans翻译:Kirsty Needham 悉尼报道和 Ryan Woo 北京报道；张艾伦北京补充报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔和大卫·埃文斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：有一定回报，但债券涨幅较石油大
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

World markets are trying to calibrate last week's steep rally in stocks and bonds - tempering some of the overcaffeinated rate cut hopes that emerged but sustaining the bulk of the gains and lapping up a fresh oil price slide.翻译:世界市场正试图调整上周股市和债券的大幅上涨，这缓和了一些过度降息的希望，但维持了大部分涨幅并接受了新一轮的油价下滑。

With Federal Reserve officials unlikely to commit either way yet, as they devour more data on the unfolding fourth quarter, investors now look to three days of Treasury debt sales to gauge whether October's bond rout was an anomaly rather a new trend.翻译:由于美联储官员不太可能做出任何承诺，因为他们正在消化更多有关第四季度的数据，投资者现在关注三天的国债销售，以判断 10 月份的债券溃败是否是一种异常现象，而不是一种新趋势。

The Treasury sells $112 billion of new notes and bonds this week, starting with $48 billion of 3-year notes later on Tuesday - before new benchmark 10-year and 30-year tenors hit the Street on Wednesday and Thursday.翻译:财政部本周发售了 1,120 亿美元的新票据和债券，周二晚些时候发售了 480 亿美元的 3 年期票据，随后新的基准 10 年期和 30 年期票据将于周三和周四上市。

Aided by a renewed slide in oil prices, where U.S. crude fell below $80 per barrel for the first time since August after disappointing Chinese export readings, 10-year Treasury yields are on the back foot again on Tuesday and hovered around 4.60% ahead of the open.翻译:由于中国出口数据令人失望，美国原油自 8 月以来首次跌破每桶 80 美元，受油价再度下滑的推动，周二 10 年期国债收益率再次陷入困境，在 4.60% 左右徘徊。打开。

Both 10- and 30-year yields are still more than 40bps below last month's peaks.翻译:10 年期和 30 年期国债收益率仍比上个月的峰值低 40 个基点以上。

The oil price slide was helped by signs from Israel that it's open to pauses in the Gaza fighting.翻译:以色列有迹象表明其愿意暂停加沙战斗，这推动了油价下跌。

But the wider picture of U.S. economic health continued to throw up some mixed signals.翻译:但美国经济健康状况的整体情况继续发出一些复杂的信号。

The Fed's quarterly loan officer survey late Monday showed banks tightened lending standards for businesses and households over the third quarter - but the pace of change appeared to ease even as demand for loans fell broadly.翻译:美联储周一晚间的季度信贷员调查显示，银行在第三季度收紧了对企业和家庭的贷款标准，但尽管贷款需求普遍下降，但变化的步伐似乎有所放缓。

No game changer then.翻译:那就没有游戏规则改变者了。

And that's seen Fed rate futures give back a little of last week's repricing - with a first quarter point policy rate cut still nailed on by June but a second no longer fully priced until September.翻译:美联储利率期货已对上周的重新定价有所回馈——到 6 月仍将下调第一季度政策利率，但第二次降息要到 9 月才会完全定价。

The typically hawkish Minneapolis Fed boss Neel Kashkari insisted it was still too early to take another rate hike off the table. "I'm a little nervous about declaring victory too soon," he said late on Monday.翻译:典型的鹰派明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔·卡什卡里坚称，现在放弃再次加息还为时过早。 “我对过早宣布胜利感到有点紧张，”他周一晚间表示。

Attention now turns to U.S. international trade - although the U.S. data on Tuesday still just reports the tail end of the third quarter.翻译:现在注意力转向美国国际贸易——尽管周二美国数据仍只是报告第三季度末。

China's poor October export numbers paint a worrying picture of global demand at large - but the wider report was more mixed and imports surprised on the upside last month.翻译:中国10月份糟糕的出口数据描绘了一幅令人担忧的全球需求图景，但更广泛的报告则更加复杂，上个月的进口意外增长。

What's more, the International Monetary Fund upgraded its forecasts for China's economic growth this year and next - at least partly based on assumptions of government policy supports.翻译:更重要的是， 国际货币基金组织上调了对中国今明两年经济增长的预测——至少部分是基于政府政策支持的假设。

Elsewhere, the Reserve Bank of Australia raised its policy interest rate again, as expected, by another quarter point to a 12-year high of 4.35%. But the Aussie dollar skidded lower as the RBA appeared to signal it's now on pause along with other major central banks.翻译:其他方面， 澳大利亚储备银行如预期再次上调政策利率25个基点至12年高点4.35%。但澳元走低，因为澳洲联储似乎暗示其现在与其他主要央行一起暂停。

Overall, the global stocks picture reflected some of the cooling of last week's rally and some of the China export numbers. Asia bourses were lower, with Japan and Hong Kong losing more than 1% and South Korea's Kospi recoiling 2% after Monday's surge. European stocks were down more modestly.翻译:总体而言，全球股市走势反映了上周涨势的部分降温以及中国出口数据的部分变化。亚洲股市走低，日本和香港股市下跌超过 1%，韩国综合股价指数在周一飙升后回落 2%。欧洲股市跌幅较为温和。

Even though the S&P500 (.SPX) eked out another gain on Monday, futures were slightly in the red ahead of today's open.翻译:尽管标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)周一再次上涨，但期货在今天开盘前小幅下跌。

UBS (UBSG.S) stock jumped more than 3% after the Swiss banking giant signalled its core wealth business is stabilising after it reported a $785 million loss in the third quarter due to expenses tied to its takeover of Credit Suisse.翻译:瑞银(UBSG.S)股价上涨逾 3%，此前这家瑞士银行巨头表示，其核心财富业务正在企稳，此前该公司公布第三季度因收购瑞士信贷相关费用而亏损 7.85 亿美元。

And WeWork, the SoftBank-backed startup whose meteoric rise and fall influenced the office sector globally, sought U.S. bankruptcy protection on Monday after its bets on companies using more of its office-sharing space soured.翻译:软银支持的初创公司WeWork的崛起和衰落影响了全球办公行业，在押注更多使用其办公共享空间的公司遭遇失败后，该公司于周一寻求美国破产保护。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:翻译:周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Sept international trade balance, Sept consumer credit; Canada Sept trade balance翻译:* 美国9月国际贸易平衡、9月消费者信贷；加拿大9月贸易平衡

* Federal Reserve Bank of New York issues Q3 Household Debt and Credit Report翻译:* 纽约联邦储备银行发布第三季度家庭债务和信用报告

* Federal Reserve Board Governor Christopher Waller, Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michael Barr, New York Fed President John Williams, Dallas Fed chief Lorie Logan, Kansas City Fed President Jeffrey Schmid all speak翻译:* 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒、美联储监管副主席迈克尔·巴尔、纽约联储主席约翰·威廉姆斯、达拉斯联储主席洛里·洛根、堪萨斯城联储主席杰弗里·施密德均发表讲话

* U.S. corporate earnings: DR Horton, eBay, Gilead Sciences, Mosaic, Emerson Electric, Occidental Petroleum, Devon Energy, Zimmer Biomat, Axon, STERIS, DaVita, Wair Products & Chemicals, Viatris, Extra Space, Jack Henry, Akamai, Gen Digital, Evergy, Expeditors, Fidelity National Information翻译:* 美国企业盈利：DR Horton、eBay、Gilead Sciences、Mosaic、Emerson Electric、Occidental Petroleum、Devon Energy、Zimmer Biomat、Axon、STERIS、DaVita、Wair Products & Chemicals、Viatris、Extra Space、Jack Henry、Akamai、Gen Digital 、Evergy、Expeditors、富达国家信息

* U.S. Treasury auctions $48 billion of 3-year notes翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖480亿美元3年期国债

By Mike Dolan, editing by Christina Fincher, <a href="mailto:mike.dolan@thomsonreuters.com" target="_blank">mike.dolan@thomsonreuters.com</a>.
